title: Carnival/Old West ID help...
content:
I feel like I’ve seen this font before, but can’t put my finger on it. Any ideas?

author: rmfernandez

comments.content: [URW Wood Type](http://web.archive.org/web/20081026140429/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/urw/wood_type_ot_std_urw/) is a condensed alternative in this [Tuscan](http://web.archive.org/web/20081026140429/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Tuscan) style.
